name: 2021 4th International Conference on Software Engineering and Information Management
content: Considering the unstable situation of COVID-19, the conference will accept the online presentation, which is also a recommended way for participation. Accepted and registered paper will be published in the International Conference Proceedings ACM(ISBN: 978-1-4503-8895-5), which indexed in Ei Compendex, Scopus, IET etc. major databases.
